mapper.sql: FUID , USERID , USERNAME , REALNAME , DESCRIPTION , OPERATING , CREATEDATE
mapper.insert: insert into base_operation_log ( FUID , USERID , USERNAME , REALNAME , DESCRIPTION , OPERATING , CREATEDATE ) values ( #{fuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{operating,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into base_operation_log
FUID ,
USERID ,
USERNAME ,
REALNAME ,
DESCRIPTION ,
OPERATING ,
CREATEDATE

mapper.update:
update base_operation_log
USERID=#{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
USERNAME=#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
REALNAME=#{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
DESCRIPTION=#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
OPERATING=#{operating,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
CREATEDATE=#{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
where FUID = #{fuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update base_operation_log set USERID=#{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , USERNAME=#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , REALNAME=#{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , DESCRIPTION=#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , OPERATING=#{operating,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CREATEDATE=#{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where FUID = #{fuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM base_operation_log WHERE FUID IN
#{item}
mapper.select:
select
from base_operation_log where #{0} LIKE cancat('%',#{1},'%')

select
from base_operation_log
username LIKE CONCAT('','${username}','%' )
